data.eml:eml: A new species of Cnemaspis Strauch 1887 (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Selangor, Peninsular Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Onn, Chan Kin, Grismer, Lee (2008): A new species of Cnemaspis Strauch 1887 (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Selangor, Peninsular Malaysia. Zootaxa 1877: 49-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184144
